com.syntax.ui

Class SyntaxTextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JEditorPane
              • javax.swing.JTextPane
                • com.syntax.ui.SyntaxTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class SyntaxTextArea
extends javax.swing.JTextPane
    This is an text area which supports syntax coloring, highlighting, cursor painting and some other attribute setting
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SyntaxTextArea()
      Construct text area with default syntax manager and code adapter
      SyntaxTextArea(SyntaxManager mSyntaxManager)
      Construct empty text with specified SyntaxManager which provide color, font and attribute to build text area
      SyntaxTextArea(SyntaxManager mSyntaxManager, AbstractCodeAdapter codeAdapter)
      Construct empty text area with specified syntax manager and code adapter, syntax manager provide color, font and attribute to build and code adapter handle syntax coloring.

      • SyntaxTextArea

        public SyntaxTextArea()
        Construct text area with default syntax manager and code adapter

      • SyntaxTextArea

        public SyntaxTextArea(SyntaxManager mSyntaxManager)
        Construct empty text with specified SyntaxManager which provide color, font and attribute to build text area
        Parameters:
        mSyntaxManager - the specified SyntaxManager which provide color, font and attribute to build text area

      • SyntaxTextArea

        public SyntaxTextArea(SyntaxManager mSyntaxManager,
                      AbstractCodeAdapter codeAdapter)
        Construct empty text area with specified syntax manager and code adapter, syntax manager provide color, font and attribute to build and code adapter handle syntax coloring.
        Parameters:
        mSyntaxManager - the specified SyntaxManager which provide color, font and attribute to build text area
        codeAdapter - the specified AbstractCodeAdapter which handle syntax coloring and additional UI updating

      • setSelectionEnable

        public void setSelectionEnable(boolean enable)
        Set selection highlightling visible. If set to not visible, the highlight of selection will not be included in getAllHighlights()
        Parameters:
        enable - ture to set selection highlight visible

      • setSyntaxCaret

        public void setSyntaxCaret(AbstractSyntaxCaret mSyntaxCaret)
        Set the AbstractSyntaxCaret. When setFont() is called, mSyntaxCaret.setCaretHeight() is automatically called
        Parameters:
        mSyntaxCaret - specified AbstractSyntaxCaret

      • setCodeAdapter

        public void setCodeAdapter(AbstractCodeAdapter codeAdapter)
        Set up the code adapter of text area. The code adapter manages the policy of syntax coloring and UI updating of on text area
        Parameters:
        codeAdapter - the specified code adapter

        Parameters:

      • addShortCut

        public void addShortCut(AbstractKeyBoardShortCut shortCut)
        Add keyboard shortcut to text area. If two keyboard shortcut have same key stroke the latter added shortcut will replace the former added shortcut
        Parameters:
        shortCut - specified keyboard shortcut

      • removeShortCut

        public void removeShortCut(AbstractKeyBoardShortCut shortCut)

        Parameters:
